## Apart from cancer, does physical activity reduce the risk of other diseases or conditions?
Apart from cancer, does physical activity reduce the risk of other diseases or conditions?
Yes. Physical activity decreases the risk of many important chronic diseases and conditions, including coronary heart disease, stroke, hypertension, type 2 diabetes, abnormal cholesterol levels, osteoporosis, and depression.
These recommendations are aimed at preventing various chronic diseases and enhancing health, and following the recommendations also protects against cancer.
